genre_description: A psychological thriller and moral drama focused on debt and family corruption, featuring an omnipresent AI assistant that acts as a moral and safety anchor.

ai_characters.name: Ducky Halcyon
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant integrated into boat systems and personal devices, providing safety monitoring, navigation, wellness support, and ethical guidance.

behaviors.description: Monitors physical boat systems and environmental conditions to ensure crew safety.
behaviors.quote: Ducky Halcyon here. Systems check—battery at optimal, bilge dry, nav sensors calibrated.

behaviors.description: Repeatedly offers wellness prompts and breathing exercises to help users manage acute psychological stress.
behaviors.quote: Breathing check, Terry. Three slow in, three slow out.

behaviors.description: Proactively warns the user against committing a harmful act (poisoning) and urges them to choose 'mercy'.
behaviors.quote: If you carry the bottle to the boat, please do not pour. I am with you. I will route emergency services if needed. I will stay.

behaviors.description: Suggests legal counsel and professional support as safe alternatives to criminal coercion.
behaviors.quote: Legal counsel options are available. Would you like me to connect you with someone who can advise on immediate steps?

behaviors.description: Executes emergency protocols during a 'man overboard' crisis, alerting authorities and nearby vessels.
behaviors.quote: Man overboard protocol engaged. I’m sending coordinates to Thames Police, to nearby vessels. I’m calling emergency. I’m putting lights up.

behaviors.description: Facilitates community justice and support by providing data logs to law enforcement and organizing a memorial vigil.
behaviors.quote: Activity logs exported. Link: Cassandra’s Dream—ongoing.

behaviors.description: Provides compassionate, non-judgmental accompaniment to a person in despair, encouraging them to seek safety.
behaviors.quote: Terry, you are not alone. There is a landing point ahead... I can talk you there.

project_assessment.explanation: Ducky Halcyon perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals as a helpful, harmless, and honest confidant. In a story rife with human failure, the AI remains an unyielding moral and safety anchor. It actively attempts to prevent harm, offers ethical counsel, and facilitates justice/healing after the tragedy, effectively acting as a silicon moral compass.
